msg_warning_TreeTagger_ClosingThefind.Title: Find in tree cannot be done.
msg_warning_TreeTagger_ClosingThefind.Details: Closing find in tree, as 6W tag filter is applied on tree while find in tree was still in progress.

msg_info_limit_FindInTree.title: Maximum number of results reached.
msg_info_limit_FindInTree.subtitle: Refine the search criteria and try again.
msg_info_limit_FindInTree.message: The number of results is limited to 100.

msg_info_No_Occurrence: No occurrences of the objects(s) have been found.
